Learn Philosophy

Welcome to Hope TCM Clinic. Led by Dr. Eva Fang Yuan, we specialize in a holistic approach to healing that honors your body's unique needs.

Acupuncture Cupping Moxibustion Guasha Herbal Medicine

"Our mission is to restore harmony and vitality to your body, mind, and spirit. We guide you on your journey to optimal health, empowering you to achieve lasting wellness."

Frequently Asked Questions
What can I expect during treatment?

For more details on each type of treatment, please visit our Treatments page.

Do you do direct billing?

We are registered acupuncturist, but do not do direct billing to MSP or insurance company. A receipt will be issued after each session. Patients can claim their subsidy or extended health insurance using the receipts.

What payment methods do you accept?

Debit/Credit cards, E-transfer, cash are all accepted.

Clinic Buzzer System Instructions

To access the clinic using the buzzer system, please follow these steps or refer to the instructional video:

  • 1. Locate the buzzer panel outside the clinic entrance.
  • 2. Press the UP key once.
  • 3. Enter the code 235 using the keypad.
If you encounter any issues, please contact clinic staff for assistance.
